name: Gunblade
description:
A simple first person fighter that tests your skills with mastering short and long range combat.

Your gun can shoot bullets that can be absorbed by the enemy's block, so you'll have to be careful when to use your gun and when to come in with your sword!

You can have another player join in by connecting a second display and controller, or test your skill against an AI

This game can be played with mouse and keyboard, but is controller preferred
